description:
The Phone Tracker is a tool that allows you to track the location of another iPhone.  Use your iPhone to watch others as they travel around your city or across the globe.  

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
Track & follow other's movements
★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

Uses include:
★ Follow your friend's movements
★ Know where your family is at any time
★ See when kids leave/arrive at school
★ Locate lost or stolen phones

Other items:
★ This version allows you to track 1 iPhone and see his/her movements for 24 hours. 
★ Upgrade allows you to follow up to 10 people and see their movements for 72 hours.
★ To follow another person, they must use the "Phone Tracker" to grant you permission.
★ Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
★ IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEMS, EMAIL US: "HELP@iPHONE-TRACKER.NET"

Features include:
★ Locate another iPhone user and view his/her movements during the previous 24 hours.
★ Permission based system allows/denies other iPhone users to follow you.
★ GPS options to reduce battery usage.
★ Blocking of individual(s) to know your location.
★ Simple registration process.
releaseNotes: New look-and-feel and minor bug fixes.
